derivation: feminine from an unused root meaning to spread out (as a family; see H4940 (מִשְׁפָּחָה));
outline:
1. maid, maid-servant, slavegirl
    1. maid, maid-servant (as belonging to a mistress)
    2. of address, speaker, humility (fig)
strongs_def: a female slave (as a member of the household)
